Most participant jobs were code by staff in the clinic when the participant was present, with the results presented in ~F132~. However, for various reasons, staff were occasionally unable to find suitable codings and the job was recorded as a \Other job\" accompanied by a free-text description.  In some cases participants declared an occupation which was not actually classified as paid/self-employment and this information was used to correct the answer given in ~F6142~."

Townsend deprivation index calculated immediately prior to participant joining UK Biobank. Based on the preceding national census output areas. Each participant is assigned a score corresponding to the output area in which their postcode is located.
